attributes.action: Refrain from holding a general election until at least May 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Holding a general election is totally unnecessary now, and would be a complete waste of public funds. Further, the state of unpreparedness among Returning Officers to conduct a fully representative election would be a travesty of democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
